INSERT INTO ip_task(task_code, cmo_code) VALUES (#{taskCode},#{cmoCode})

mapper.update: UPDATE ip_task SET ip_task.task_status='${@org.wipo.connect.shared.exchange.enumerator.InterestedPartyTaskStatusEnum@COMPLETED.toString()}' WHERE ip_task.task_status='NEW' AND not exists (select 0 from ip_task_item where ip_task.id_ip_task = ip_task_item.fk_ip_task AND ip_task_item.item_status != '${@org.wipo.connect.shared.exchange.enumerator.InterestedPartyTaskStatusEnum@COMPLETED.toString()}')
